patthana19.6:1.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:2.1: Naavitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana19.6:3.1: Naavitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana19.6:4.1: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa, ārammaṇe tiṃsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṃsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekūnatiṃsa …pe… avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
